title: riot games system for afks is so bad
body: I was playing 1 rank game and my wifi con sudenly go blank, i instanly restart my wifi and i am waiting gor it,when is back up i try to rec as fast as i can but riot send me error code directx ,i restrt my laptop and i fix some option on it so i can reconnect porplely.At the end it doesnt even mater that i won that game cause i got leave buster after that and -18 lp , is that rly how you go on your game riot ??{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} {{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body: It sounds like you were gone for long enough to be marked as a leaver, and you would only receive a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty after a history of leaving games.  Getting this sorted out is definitely a good step to finish the lower priority queue, but I recommend testing your connection in a custom game first just to be sure.   I know getting a loss for that doesn't feel good, but the other players who were down a player had a poor experience too.  Let me know if you're still having anymore technical issues though!

Reasons why they don't recommend you playing on a wifi connection...
